pages.text: The Polearm is extremely versatile and you might find yourself using it, even if you don't like it for combat.
It has two extra block and entity reach, making it great for fighting at a distance and tt can disable shields, making it a perfect long range offensive tool.
It also works as an Axe and can be used to chop down any tree in just a single block break, making it a perfect tool for handling any large forest for wood farming.
